nodes.text: Mitt was a male Trandoshan who lived on the planet Budpock during the reign of the New Republic, where he worked for the Rodian spice distributor Threnda. In 19 ABY, Mitt was repairing a CLL-6 binary load lifter droid in Threnda's warehouse when the Jedi archivist Mander Zuma and the spacers Reen Irana and Eddey Be'ray burst in and destroyed Threnda's stocks of the spice Tempest with a grenade. The Trandoshan subsequently used a fire extinguisher to put out the flames produced by the blast.
